summary: The Veterans’ Caregiver Appeals Modernization Act of 2025 aims to improve the Department of Veterans Affairs program providing assistance to family caregivers. The bill mandates the development of a digital system for accessing applications and documents related to caregiver support, and requires the Secretary to provide employees evaluating appeals with uniform training. The bill also considers issues of caregiver stipends upon the death of a veteran and mandates that the Secretary of Veterans Affairs consider lessons learned from other systems.
